峿字的基本解释

峿
wú
〔岖峿〕崎岖，如“豫章楩柟之可以大??者，必在夫大山穹谷孱颜峿峿之区。”
山。

峿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wú］
［《廣韻》五乎切，平模，疑。］
(1)峿山。在山东安丘县西南。
(2)台名。参见“峿臺”。
(3)见“巖峿”。
[②]［yǔ］
［《集韻》偶舉切，上語，疑。］
见“岨3峿”。

峿字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页312第21
【廣韻】五乎切【集韻】訛胡切，?音吾。嶇峿，山名。【集韻】通作?。　又地名。【前漢·地理志】東海郡司吾。或从山，今齊東有㟃峿驛。　又【廣韻】【集韻】偶舉切【韻會】語許切【正韻】偶許切，?音敔。岨峿，山貌。　又不安貌。【陸機·文賦】或岨峿而不安。【正字通】與齬鋙通。

峿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
峿字的起名意思

指山或崎岖，如岖峿。

峿
Basic explanation of words
峿
wú
〔Jugyu〕 is rugged, such as "Those who can be bigger than Yuzhang Phoebe, must be in the area of Fuda Mountain dome valley."
mountain.
峿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wú］
["Guangyun" five almost cut, flat model, suspicious. ]
(1) Yushan. In the southwest of Anqiu County, Shandong.
(2) The name of the station. See "峿台".
(3) See "Rocks".
[②]［yǔ］
["Ji Yun" occasionally cut, on the words, doubt. ]
See "岨3峿".
峿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峿; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 312 21
[Guangyun] Wuhuqie [Jiyun] False Huqie, sound Wu. The rugged valley, the name of the mountain. 【Jiyun】Common for?.　Also place name. [Former Han Geography] Siwu, Donghai County. Or from the mountain, today there is Miyu Station in Qidong.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Ou Chuqie [Rhyme Meeting] Yu Xu Qi [Zheng Yun] Ou Xu Qi,? Yin 敔. Wayu, mountain appearance.　Uneasy appearance again. [Lu Ji·Wenfu] or Wa's uneasy. [Zhengzitong] Connect with 龉铻.

Name meaning
Refers to mountains or rugged, such as rugged valleys.
